name: Cherubi
flavorText:
The small ball holds the nutrients
needed for evolution. Apparently,
it is very sweet and tasty.

previous.name: Floatzel
previous.flavorText:
It floats using its well-developed
flotation sac. It assists in the
rescues of drowning people.

next.name: Cherrim
next.flavorText:
It blooms during times of strong
sunlight. It tries to make up for
everything it endured as a bud.
next.formDescription: Sunshine form is active during strong sunlight.  Otherwise, Cherrim defaults to its Overcast form.

pokemon.name: Cherubi

The small ball holds the nutrients
needed for evolution. Apparently,
it is very sweet and tasty.

It blooms during times of strong
sunlight. It tries to make up for
everything it endured as a bud.
pokemon.formDescription: Sunshine form is active during strong sunlight.  Otherwise, Cherrim defaults to its Overcast form.
